metadata.title: CVE-2017-12963 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: There is an illegal address access in Sass::Eval::operator() in eval.cpp ofLibSass 3.4.5, leading to a remote denial of service attack. NOTE: this issimilar to CVE-2017-11555 but remains exploitable after the vendor'sCVE-2017-11555 fix (available from GitHub after 2017-07-24).

criterions.comment: libsass: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
